reviewText: I ordered the kata disk, it wouldnt even load/play, glad i didn't spend my $on this overpriced one

I bought this set of DVDs because my friend, and my instructor, Shihan Kim Murray is the lead in this series. It has to be the single most powerful display of Isshin Ryu katas I have ever seen. If you practice, then you should view these. If you do not own these DVDs then you should buy them now, because I really believe that these DVDs will illustrate to you the power and spirit of Isshin Ryu Karate. Shihan, thanks again for setting an example!

Shihan Kim Murray is a very well respected and respectable Martial Artist. He is in touch with traditional values and yet has a modern approach that is very effective.  I studied with him for 3 years during School and his classes are some of the most memorable and uplifting moments I have from my college days.

This product is really overpriced. I bought the whole 4 dvd of the isshin ryu karate system and I was totally deceived. All in all, a very superficial work: basic stances are taught in 10 minutes, work on legs in non-existent. The entire dvd on kata, does not give step by step directions, but just starts with the master moving around, and giving blows to the air....how can a junior karate starter follow thorugh ???
The only section which is acceptable is the dvd on self defense (note: the 4th dvd is just a repetition of the dvd number 1, with a 15 minute addition on self defense): basic self defenses tecniques. All of them you can find in Fairbarns or Appleton classics on hand to hand combat books).
Don't buy this package, there is a lot better out there.
